description:
Everything Butt...
What happens when you take some of the best asses in the industry, Adrianna Nicole, Aiden Starr, Dana DeArmond and Trinity Post, and put them in the same room with time to spare? Find out in this test shoot for a possible new ass-centric site....
Two girls arrive in NYC for dance auditions and find that the hotel their fathers reserved didn't hold their rooms for them like they were supposed to. They end up in a sleazy Times Square hotel with only one bed, faulty wiring, bad plumbing, a hot maid with an ulterior motive, and a dirty little secret in the cellar.
Let them take you on a 75 Min audition into depravity deeply rooted in the fetish associated with spanking, enema & anal play.
WARNING! This is not for the light hearted, this is only for those who want to delve into EVERYTHING BUTT!!!!!
For a special in-depth look at why anal play is such a turn-on to our models and director, please visit BehindKink.com.
title: Everything Butt... If you're into ASS, this is for you!
